column4: are all serial modems suppored by ubuntu? i know that only some winmodems are...but from what i understand serial modems are all supported because they are hardware modems, is this correct?
A modem connected via a serial cable may still be a win-modem.
However that is just in theory. I've yet to hear of a winmodem that is not on a pci or similar card.
Well simply the fact that it runs over a serial cable does not mean that it's 100% sure that it's not a winmodem.
